txt.en:
The armies of Saruman have devised a hook and chain mechanism for their ballista and are firing their grapnels upon the eastern walls of the Hornburg's outer fortifications. The attachments allow the enemy to topple sections of defences, which must not happen if the Rohirrim are to bide time for those within the keep. 

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Wall section structurally damaged by hook and chain

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Wall guards defeated
Do not allow any section of wall to be destroyed
A hook has been attached to the wall
A section of the wall has been destroyed
A hook has been attached to the wall
Defend the wall against the attacking waves ([placeholder]/12)

The armies of Saruman are using siege weapons to fire hook and chain attachments onto the walls of the Hornburg. The ballista hooks are able to cause damage to the structure of the Rohirrim defences once they have latched on. The defences must disable the hooks and hold the defences for a moment longer, while Th√©oden King plans the counter-attack.
